statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ -12 \\ -6 \\ 2 \\ -18 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 4 \\ 2 \\ -9 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
